characters.title: Special Dreamer
characters.tagline: Rar'n to go! A pure-hearted girl focused on her dream.
characters.ears: Perks up and teleports to the kitchen when she hears the sounds of cooking
characters.tail: Moves along with her emotions, making her a terrible poker player
characters.family: She gets her eye color from her birth mother
secrets: Did you know? She can tell different brands of milk apart from taste alone.

characters.title: Silent Innocence
characters.tagline: The silent runner aiming to break the sound barrier.
characters.ears: Sometimes doesn't hear anything when she thinks about running
characters.tail: She always makes efforts to reduce her wind resistance
characters.family: Gave her more pocket money for shoes
secrets: Did you know? She's skilled at spinning pens.

characters.title: Top of Joyful
characters.tagline: Unbeatable and adorable! A happy hoppin' racer.
characters.ears: Never fails to hear praise or the Prez's voice
characters.tail: Wags with excitement when she's receiving attention
characters.family: They cried when she stopped calling them "Mama" and "Papa"
secrets: Did you know? She holds the record for her forward bend.

characters.title: Rouge Formula
characters.tagline: Keeping it old-school! A real hot rod!
characters.ears: Wants to boogie when she hears Eurobeat music
characters.tail: Getting it all silky with a morning shower is her favorite part of the day
characters.family: The bright red sports car is a hand-me-down from her dad
secrets: Did you know? She gets carsick when she's in the passenger seat.

characters.title: Shooting Star Revue
characters.tagline: Always at your service. The classiest racer around.
characters.ears: Has perfect pitch
characters.tail: Sway gracefully like magnificent feather accessories of the stage
characters.family: Coming from a theater family, her parents travel all over the country
secrets: Did you know? She can make a dove appear out of a top hat, and she can make a top hat appear out of nothing.

characters.title: Starlight Beat
characters.tagline: A coolheaded dreamer from the countryside.
characters.ears: Can tell apart people from her hometown just from their cheers
characters.tail: She's flexible enough, so there's no spot she can't reach
characters.family: Her family always vacations at hot springs, and knows of at least one hidden spring
secrets: Did you know? She's fantastic at trimming her nails just right.

characters.title: Red Strife
characters.tagline: Wild and unpredictable, this golden runner is unlike anybody else!
characters.ears: She covers people's ears and asks "Guess who?"
characters.tail: Sometimes forgets it in her room (according to her)
characters.family: Apparently, it's a national secret
secrets: Did you know? She's scarily good at trivia quizzes.

characters.title: Wild Top Gear
characters.tagline: Headstrong and full of life! A roadster with a heart of gold.
characters.ears: She gets strangely bashful when they're touched
characters.tail: Currently practicing a cool way to swish her tail
characters.family: Often gets scolded by her mom for causing mischief with her dad
secrets: Did you know? She practices how to slide a glass down a counter.

characters.title: Top of Blue
characters.tagline: Beyond arrogant! This hothead hates to lose.
characters.ears: Completely betray her true feelings
characters.tail: Fights with her comb everyday to tame her curls
characters.family: Admires and misses her hard-working mother
secrets: Did you know? She can draw straight lines without using a ruler.

characters.title: Wild Frontier
characters.tagline: A friendly girl born in the U.S.
characters.ears: She comes running the second she hears "party"
characters.tail: She uses a tail spray sent by the folks back home
characters.family: Welcome-home fireworks are always at the ready for her
secrets: Did you know? She's the reigning quick draw competition champion.

characters.title: Rock-piercing Blue
characters.tagline: Neat and sweet. Japanese at heart, she's back home from the U.S.
characters.ears: Do not tremble in the slightest when she's doing a tea ceremony
characters.tail: Can get bugs off her back without looking over her shoulder
characters.strong: Japanese sweets, Japanese culture, competitive karuta
characters.weak: Insects, disrespect for history and tradition
characters.family: Gets her love of Japan from her parents. Her home has a Japanese-style room
secrets: Did you know? She's secretly particular about her skirt length.

characters.title: Amazoness Lapis
characters.tagline: You wanna go? One-on-one! The dorm leader everyone knows and loves.
characters.ears: Can hear someone say "one-on-one" from a mile away
characters.tail: Her glossy black tail is admired by many students
characters.family: Gets her caring nature from her mother and is actually the youngest child
secrets: Did you know? She uses a peculiar ironing cloth.

characters.title: Elegance Line
characters.tagline: The crown jewel of the prestigious Mejiro family. A classy and poised young lady.
characters.ears: Tend to stand very straight when she's around others
characters.tail: Swishes her tail excitedly when she talks about sports
characters.family: Her parents call her "Mackie"
secrets: Did you know? She sometime shouts "Bring 'em home!" in her sleep and wakes herself up.

characters.title: El ☆ Numero 1
characters.tagline: The North American Phantom Bird! A vivacious and quirky lucha libre.
characters.ears: Stand up straight whenever she hears someone count
characters.tail: Apparently grabbing the tail is a foul
characters.family: Grew up with a hawk named "Mambo" that was basically a sibling to her
secrets: Did you know? She has a special fabric softener just for her mask.

characters.title: O Sole So
characters.tagline: The pompous star of the stage. Her laugh fills the room!
characters.ears: Hear everything as a compliment
characters.tail: Seems to glisten when light hits it
characters.family: She's thankful to her parents for making a beautiful daughter like her
secrets: Did you know? She's made just one huge change to her ear decoration in the past.

characters.title: Maverick
characters.tagline: Actions speak louder than words! A tough and stubborn lone wolf.
characters.ears: Her blood starts pumping when she hears fanfare
characters.tail: She never cared much for appearances
characters.family: Her parents and sister say her silence is proof of her kindness
secrets: Did you know? The stem in her mouth comes from her family's gardens.

characters.title: Road of Emperor
characters.tagline: The reigning Emperor. Her rule is absolute!
characters.ears: Twitch noticeably whenever she comes up with a pun
characters.tail: Even the hairs on her tail feel electric when she's giving a speech
characters.family: Her parents have been teaching her the art of governing from a young age
secrets: Did you know? She'll always remember a face.

characters.title: Empress Road
characters.tagline: The coolly calculating Empress. Highly gifted and ambitious.
characters.ears: Droop ever so slightly when she takes care of flowers
characters.tail: Uses the same tail oil as her mother
characters.weak: Things that suddenly flash or move
characters.family: Meticulously plans her mom's birthday party a year in advance.
secrets: Did you know? She hates all insects except ladybugs.

characters.title: Super Express! Full Color Special
characters.tagline: I love Umamusume! A super versatile otaku.
characters.ears: Their hair bristles when they pick up an "emotional wave"
characters.tail: She gets her tail done at a salon before concerts
characters.family: Her family loves camping, festivals, and barbecues!
secrets: Did you know? When she's bringing up the rear, she wishes she at least had an "End of the Line" sign.

characters.title: Blue Cloud Thumbing
characters.tagline: Does what she wants, when she wants. As free as a drifting cloud...
characters.ears: Occasionally stand straight and still when she hears something
characters.tail: Just looks good without doing anything
characters.weak: Small, confined spaces (The gate, the gate!)
characters.family: Goes fishing with her grandpa every time she goes home
secrets: Did you know? She really, really, really cannot handle hot food.

characters.title: pf.Victory Formula...
characters.tagline: A fiery intellectual. Logic is her weapon!
characters.ears: She's been sensitive to noises since she was little, and was therefore easily startled
characters.tail: Has a hard time getting her tail through the hole in her pants when it's humid
characters.family: Her mother used to have her wear matching hairstyles with her sister
secrets: Did you know? She writes hair spray reviews.

characters.title: Scramble ☆ Zone
characters.tagline: She's like your sweet little sister. She can't wait to grow up!
characters.ears: Can pop her ears at will
characters.tail: Her tail wags ferociously when she lies
characters.family: Her father is a pilot, and they used to play together at the airport
secrets: Did you know? No matter the paper, she can always make an amazing paper airplane.

characters.title: MB-19890425
characters.tagline: Always follows commands! The cyborg Umamusume.
characters.ears: Perk right up when they hear a command, even if she's dead asleep
characters.tail: Her tail's strong enough that she can stand on it... according to rumors
characters.family: Her family lives an analog lifestyle now because their appliances kept breaking
secrets: Did you know? Thanks to her father, she still thinks something might steal her tail when thunder strikes.

characters.title: Straight Line
characters.tagline: Nothing beats a good workout! Even the sweat of her brow is earnest and pure.
characters.ears: Change positions a lot when she's reading romance manga
characters.tail: She really works up a sweat, so she has a separate towel for her tail
characters.family: Her dad looks so young that he's often mistaken for her brother
secrets: Did you know? It takes her a long time to decide what body cleansing wipes to buy.

characters.title: Bono ☆ Alla Moda
characters.tagline: Big and generous... portions? Get some more buono in your life! ♪
characters.ears: Can hear the faintest rumble of an empty stomach
characters.tail: Twirls around whenever she whisks ingredients
characters.family: Her father is a master chef, and her mother is a confectionary teacher
secrets: Did you know? She burns through notebooks at an extremely fast rate.

characters.title: Rose Dream
characters.tagline: Bringer of misfortune? This racer pursues her dreams despite her dreary outlook.
characters.ears: Droop when she hears of other people's misfortune
characters.tail: She's mindful not to hit people with her tail
characters.family: Her parents used to read her picture books as bedtime stories
secrets: Did you know? She prefers bread for breakfast.

characters.title: Tach-nology
characters.tagline: A mad scientist who fears no law. Weaknesses of the flesh can be overcome!
characters.ears: Never, ever touch her ears or forehead
characters.tail: The hairs stand on end when she gets an idea
characters.family: The oddball of a famous racing family
secrets: Did you know? She's constantly getting packages from abroad.

characters.title: Go To Winning!
characters.tagline: Never hold back your feelings! This girl wears her heart on her sleeve.
characters.ears: Her best friend says "Even the way her ears move is annoying"
characters.tail: Expresses her joy, anger, and even sorrow
characters.strong: Cheering on friends, feeling her feelings
characters.family: Nothing gets in the way of her family's annual tradition of watching the Derby
secrets: Did you know? She's very particular about her choice of undergarments.

characters.title: Meisterschaft
characters.tagline: Everything she does is according to her plan. A solemn and diligent mädchen.
characters.ears: Finds the sound of a metronome calming
characters.tail: She trims it to the most exact millimeter
characters.family: They run a cake shop famous for its baumkuchen
secrets: Did you know? She's great at reading storybooks out loud.

characters.title: Fille Éclair
characters.tagline: A shining star of pure cuteness! I need lots of love and attention, okay?
characters.ears: If she beckons you, it's because she wants to be spoiled
characters.tail: Ultra-soft and fluffy—almost captivatingly so
characters.family: They miss their daughter so much, they've applied for positions at Tracen Academy
secrets: Did you know? Half of her top ten favorite movies are horror films.

characters.title: Princess of Pink
characters.tagline: She dreams of being a princess! A bold spitfire of an Umamusume.
characters.ears: She's proud to have ears most fitting of a tiara
characters.tail: Lovingly named "Princess Tail"
characters.family: Her parents knew to give her clothing that was durable as well as cute
secrets: Did you know? She once grew twelve centimeters in a year.

characters.title: Authentic 1928
characters.tagline: A blunt racer and the gold standard in racing and beauty.
characters.ears: Will win the struggle against her alarm clock someday
characters.tail: Involuntarily goes completely still when having her picture taken
characters.family: Gets her flawless skin from her mom and her golden blonde hair from her dad
secrets: Did you know? Her alarm clock is set to ring every two minutes.

characters.title: Sakura, Forward!
characters.tagline: This class representative's gone wild! Full Speed Bakushiiiin!
characters.ears: Only hear about half of what anyone says
characters.tail: Good luck grabbing it when she's in full-on Bakushin Mode
characters.weak: Anything requiring three or more steps
characters.family: Her family's motto is "Compliments, compliments, and more compliments!"
secrets: Did you know? She'll always protect her lance pieces in shogi.

characters.title: Murmuring Stream
characters.tagline: Motherly and kind, her presence is soothing.
characters.weight: Slight increase (the reason is a secret)
characters.ears: Likes cleaning out people's ears. Does not like having her ears cleaned
characters.tail: Great at calming children
characters.family: Her family runs a daycare with a reputation for warmth
secrets: Did you know? She's great at rolling perfectly round rice cakes.

characters.title: Absolute ☆ LOVE
characters.tagline: Leave the fanservice to her! Self-proclaimed future top Umadol.
characters.ears: Can hear every single one of her fans
characters.tail: She's mindful of how she sits so as not to mess up the hairs
characters.family: Her hair ornament is the first idol costume part that her mother made
secrets: Did you know? She's a pro at making hand-drawn signs.

characters.title: Nevertheless
characters.tagline: Cool and matter-of-fact! Her slight frame gives her an unexpected advantage.
characters.ears: Only pay attention to topics she's interested in
characters.tail: Unless you're a friend, touching it will earn you a swift kick
characters.family: There's a rumor that a BNW mom group is about to form
secrets: Did you know? She's a big deal in the rhythm game scene.

characters.title: Uraran First Prize ♪
characters.tagline: No matter how many times she falls, this girl always picks herself back up!
characters.weight: Slight increase (but not a big deal)
characters.ears: Big words go in one ear and out the other
characters.tail: She used to think spinning it would make her run faster
characters.family: She likes her mom's carrot rice the best
secrets: Did you know? She can't say "prestigious."

characters.title: Rising Luck ☆ Flood of Happiness
characters.tagline: Fortune be with me! This charm-tastic Umamusume loves fortune-telling.
characters.weight: Slight decrease because today is an unlucky day
characters.ears: Sometimes used as directional fortune-telling
characters.tail: Completely stops moving when she's fortune-telling
characters.family: The talented older sister admires her little sister's bright personality
secrets: Did you know? She holds an advanced rank in Japanese calligraphy.

characters.title: Blue/Raging
characters.tagline: In order to change her outlook and herself, this pessimist gives it her all.
characters.ears: Often tremble slightly
characters.tail: Gets tangled often because she fidgets with it when she worries
characters.family: As a family that's had to travel and move for work a lot, they're are all skilled in languages
secrets: Did you know? She likes her food super spicy.

characters.title: Poinsettia Ribbon
characters.tagline: Don't expect much from her. This Umamusume is super cynical.
characters.ears: Always jerk a little anytime she hears "Natie"
characters.tail: She secretly brushes it late at night
characters.family: Articles about her are displayed on the walls of her family's bar
secrets: Did you know? She's an expert at using up leftovers in the fridge.

characters.title: King of Emeralds
characters.tagline: Extremely haughty. Her pride extends to the heavens!
characters.ears: Uninterested in hearing anything that isn't first-rate
characters.tail: Even her tail movements are first-rate
characters.weak: Things unsuitable for a king, such as crowds and heat
characters.family: Her mother is terrible at housework, so they have a full-time maid
secrets: Did you know? She'll keep playing raffles until she wins or empties her wallet.

uniqueCharacters.title: Special Dreamer
uniqueCharacters.tagline: Rar'n to go! A pure-hearted girl focused on her dream.
uniqueCharacters.ears: Perks up and teleports to the kitchen when she hears the sounds of cooking

uniqueCharacters.ears: If she beckons you, it's because she wants to be spoiled
uniqueCharacters.tail: Ultra-soft and fluffy—almost captivatingly so
uniqueCharacters.family: They miss their daughter so much, they've applied for positions at Tracen Academy
secrets: Did you know? Half of her top ten favorite movies are horror films.

uniqueCharacters.title: Princess of Pink
uniqueCharacters.tagline: She dreams of being a princess! A bold spitfire of an Umamusume.
uniqueCharacters.ears: She's proud to have ears most fitting of a tiara
uniqueCharacters.tail: Lovingly named "Princess Tail"
uniqueCharacters.family: Her parents knew to give her clothing that was durable as well as cute
secrets: Did you know? She once grew twelve centimeters in a year.

uniqueCharacters.title: Authentic 1928
uniqueCharacters.tagline: A blunt racer and the gold standard in racing and beauty.
uniqueCharacters.ears: Will win the struggle against her alarm clock someday
uniqueCharacters.tail: Involuntarily goes completely still when having her picture taken
uniqueCharacters.family: Gets her flawless skin from her mom and her golden blonde hair from her dad
secrets: Did you know? Her alarm clock is set to ring every two minutes.

uniqueCharacters.title: Sakura, Forward!
uniqueCharacters.tagline: This class representative's gone wild! Full Speed Bakushiiiin!
uniqueCharacters.ears: Only hear about half of what anyone says
uniqueCharacters.tail: Good luck grabbing it when she's in full-on Bakushin Mode
uniqueCharacters.weak: Anything requiring three or more steps
uniqueCharacters.family: Her family's motto is "Compliments, compliments, and more compliments!"
secrets: Did you know? She'll always protect her lance pieces in shogi.

uniqueCharacters.title: Murmuring Stream
uniqueCharacters.tagline: Motherly and kind, her presence is soothing.
uniqueCharacters.weight: Slight increase (the reason is a secret)
uniqueCharacters.ears: Likes cleaning out people's ears. Does not like having her ears cleaned
uniqueCharacters.tail: Great at calming children
uniqueCharacters.family: Her family runs a daycare with a reputation for warmth
secrets: Did you know? She's great at rolling perfectly round rice cakes.

uniqueCharacters.title: Absolute ☆ LOVE
uniqueCharacters.tagline: Leave the fanservice to her! Self-proclaimed future top Umadol.
uniqueCharacters.ears: Can hear every single one of her fans
uniqueCharacters.tail: She's mindful of how she sits so as not to mess up the hairs
uniqueCharacters.family: Her hair ornament is the first idol costume part that her mother made
secrets: Did you know? She's a pro at making hand-drawn signs.

uniqueCharacters.title: Nevertheless
uniqueCharacters.tagline: Cool and matter-of-fact! Her slight frame gives her an unexpected advantage.
uniqueCharacters.ears: Only pay attention to topics she's interested in
uniqueCharacters.tail: Unless you're a friend, touching it will earn you a swift kick
uniqueCharacters.family: There's a rumor that a BNW mom group is about to form
secrets: Did you know? She's a big deal in the rhythm game scene.

uniqueCharacters.title: Uraran First Prize ♪
uniqueCharacters.tagline: No matter how many times she falls, this girl always picks herself back up!
uniqueCharacters.weight: Slight increase (but not a big deal)
uniqueCharacters.ears: Big words go in one ear and out the other
uniqueCharacters.tail: She used to think spinning it would make her run faster
uniqueCharacters.family: She likes her mom's carrot rice the best
secrets: Did you know? She can't say "prestigious."

uniqueCharacters.title: Rising Luck ☆ Flood of Happiness
uniqueCharacters.tagline: Fortune be with me! This charm-tastic Umamusume loves fortune-telling.
uniqueCharacters.weight: Slight decrease because today is an unlucky day
uniqueCharacters.ears: Sometimes used as directional fortune-telling
uniqueCharacters.tail: Completely stops moving when she's fortune-telling
uniqueCharacters.family: The talented older sister admires her little sister's bright personality
secrets: Did you know? She holds an advanced rank in Japanese calligraphy.

uniqueCharacters.title: Blue/Raging
uniqueCharacters.tagline: In order to change her outlook and herself, this pessimist gives it her all.
uniqueCharacters.ears: Often tremble slightly
uniqueCharacters.tail: Gets tangled often because she fidgets with it when she worries
uniqueCharacters.family: As a family that's had to travel and move for work a lot, they're are all skilled in languages
secrets: Did you know? She likes her food super spicy.

uniqueCharacters.title: Poinsettia Ribbon
uniqueCharacters.tagline: Don't expect much from her. This Umamusume is super cynical.
uniqueCharacters.ears: Always jerk a little anytime she hears "Natie"
uniqueCharacters.tail: She secretly brushes it late at night
uniqueCharacters.family: Articles about her are displayed on the walls of her family's bar
secrets: Did you know? She's an expert at using up leftovers in the fridge.

uniqueCharacters.title: King of Emeralds
uniqueCharacters.tagline: Extremely haughty. Her pride extends to the heavens!
uniqueCharacters.ears: Uninterested in hearing anything that isn't first-rate
uniqueCharacters.tail: Even her tail movements are first-rate
uniqueCharacters.weak: Things unsuitable for a king, such as crowds and heat
uniqueCharacters.family: Her mother is terrible at housework, so they have a full-time maid
secrets: Did you know? She'll keep playing raffles until she wins or empties her wallet.
